body_html:
I said “everything” yet you didn’t include the RLock statement inside the if statement...

—————————

The issue here is not that you cannot avoid this problem. The issue is that it’s not good software engineering if a function or package has a undocumented and hard to spot side affect.

body:
I said “everything” yet you didn’t include the RLock statement inside the if statement...

—————————

The issue here is not that you cannot avoid this problem. The issue is that it’s not good software engineering if a function or package has a undocumented and hard to spot side affect.
